thread.title: Charles Mchugh
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Charles Mchugh

author: Charles Mchugh
title: Charles Mchugh
text: I honestly thought it too good to be true, and confirmed with Barbour that it was a genuine supplier. I am very happy with the transaction and saved a small fortune.
